value.name: Town of Ridgeville named in lawsuit
value.description: Brian M. Pierce, an attorney from Muncie, Indiana, announced that his client, Eric Huffman, was filing a federal lawsuit against the Town of Ridgeville, Indiana

value.name: Impact Implements Additional Customer Facing Toll-Free API Options
value.description: "Impact is recognized as a leading provider of US domestic and international voice and toll-free solutions for the world's largest service providers," said Jason Welch, EVP Carrier Services at Impact.
